error.message: Call to deprecated function tablesort_get_sort(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Utility\TableSort::getSort() instead.
Call to deprecated function tablesort_get_sort(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Utility\TableSort::getSort() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to sys.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
